channel.title: Tabs to Blast Pit 3?
channel.description: Does anyone here have guitar tabs to Blast Pit 3? I emailed Joel one time and he sent me chords instead and I'm a guitar newbie so when I googled those chords, I didn't know which version of them was right.

item.title: Tabs to Blast Pit 3?
item.dc:creator: sourcegamer101
item.description:
hes harmonizing, chords are C minor, Eb major (or even major 7), G minor 7 (no 5 from root), Eb/G, Ab major 7, and Fsus2 (or add9) no 3rd

Sadly there are no wrong ways to play chords like these, they all have inversions and intervals you can omit since most of the chord fingerings for these chords are unconventional

Read full topic

item.title: Tabs to Blast Pit 3?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
It sounds mostly like power chords and octaves. I can’t imagine it would be too hard to transcribe by ear.
